column1: BOOK$ABBREVIATION$CHAPTER$TOPIC$VERSE NUMBER$VERSE TEXT
Geneses$Gen$1$The Seventh Day
column2: God Rests$1$Thus the heavens and the earth were finished
column3: and all the host of them.

column1: Geneses$Gen$1$The Seventh Day
column2: God Rests$2$And on the seventh day God ended his work which he had made; and he rested on the seventh day from all his work which he had made.

column1: Geneses$Gen$1$The Seventh Day
column2: God Rests$3$And God blessed the seventh day
column3: and sanctified it: because that in it he had rested from all his work which God created and made.

column1: Geneses$Gen$1$The Creation of Man and Woman$4$These are the generations of the heavens and of the earth when they were created
column2: in the day that the LORD God made the earth and the heavens

column1: Geneses$Gen$1$The Creation of Man and Woman$5$And every plant of the field before it was in the earth
column2: and every herb of the field before it grew: for the LORD God had not caused it to rain upon the earth
column3: and there was not a man to till the ground.

column1: Geneses$Gen$1$The Creation of Man and Woman$6$But there went up a mist from the earth
column2: and watered the whole face of the ground.But there went up a mist from the earth
column3: and watered the whole face of the ground.

column1: Geneses$Gen$1$The Creation of Man and Woman$7$And the LORD God formed man of the dust of the ground
column2: and breathed into his nostrils the breath of life; and man became a living soul.

column1: Geneses$Gen$1$The Creation of Man and Woman$8$And the LORD God planted a garden eastward in Eden; and there he put the man whom he had formed.
Geneses$Gen$1$The Creation of Man and Woman$9$And out of the ground made the LORD God to grow every tree that is pleasant to the sight
column2: and good for food; the tree of life also in the midst of the garden
column3: and the tree of knowledge of good and evil.

column1: Geneses$Gen$1$The Creation of Man and Woman$10$And a river went out of Eden to water the garden; and from thence it was parted
Geneses$Gen$1$The Creation of Man and Woman$11$The name of the first is Pison: that is it which compasseth the whole land of Havilah
Geneses$Gen$1$The Creation of Man and Woman$12$And the gold of that land is good: there is bdellium and the onyx stone.
Geneses$Gen$1$The Creation of Man and Woman$13$And the name of the second river is Gihon: the same is it that compasseth the whole land of Ethiopia.
Geneses$Gen$1$The Creation of Man and Woman$14$And the name of the third river is Hiddekel: that is it which goeth toward the east of Assyria. And the fourth river is Euphrates.
Geneses$Gen$1$The Creation of Man and Woman$15$And the LORD God took the man
column2: and put him into the garden of Eden to dress it and to keep it.

column1: Geneses$Gen$1$The Creation of Man and Woman$16$And the LORD God commanded the man
column3: Of every tree of the garden thou mayest freely eat:

column1: Geneses$Gen$1$The Creation of Man and Woman$17$But of the tree of the knowledge of good and evil
column2: thou shalt not eat of it: for in the day that thou eatest thereof thou shalt surely die.

column1: Geneses$Gen$1$The Creation of Man and Woman$18$And the LORD God said
column2: It is not good that the man should be alone; I will make him an help meet for him.

column1: Geneses$Gen$1$The Creation of Man and Woman$19$And out of the ground the LORD God formed every beast of the field
column2: and every fowl of the air; and brought them unto Adam to see what he would call them: and whatsoever Adam called every living creature

column1: Geneses$Gen$1$The Creation of Man and Woman$20$And Adam gave names to all cattle
column2: and to the fowl of the air
column3: and to every beast of the field; but for Adam there was not found an help meet for him.
